ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup

steps.instruction: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
Add noodles and frozen peas. Cook for 5 minutes until noodles are al dente
Drain the pot well and return noodles and peas to the pot
Mix soup, tuna fish, onions, processed cheese and pepper into the pot. Stir constantly until all of the ingredients are well mixed and the cheese has melted.
